content.title: **[{{ProdFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** equips {{EnvName}} developers with a robust API for programmatically updating watermarks within various {{FileFormatUp}} documents. This guide outlines the process:
content.step_1: Start the process by supplying your {{FileFormatUp}} file as an argument to the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} class constructor. Depending no your demands the file can be provided as either a stream or a reference to a local disk location.
content.step_2: Subsequently, leverage the {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} object to identify the specific watermarks requiring modification. This object enables the pinpointing of watermarks based on the desired properties.
content.step_3: Upon successful execution of the search, you'll receive a collection of relevant watermarks. These watermarks offer granular control, allowing you to update properties such as dimensions, page positioning, text content, color scheme, image data, and more.
content.step_4: Following the completion of watermark updates, persist the modified document. The API facilitates storage using either a local file path or a stream object.

more_features.title: Mastering Watermark Editing in PDFs with {{ProdShortName}}
more_features.description: Explore comprehensive API features for adjusting and managing watermarks in PDFs within {{EnvName}} applications.

feature_1.title: Effortlessly Edit Watermarks in PDFs
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} offers robust tools in {{EnvName}} to seamlessly edit existing watermarks in PDF documents. Adjust position, transparency, and more with ease.

feature_2.title: Refine Watermark Details for Precision
feature_2.content: Take control over the details. Our API allows you to fine-tune the appearance of watermarks, enabling precise modifications of size, opacity, and color in your PDFs.

feature_3.title: Streamlined Watermark Management
feature_3.content: Our API simplifies watermark management. Whether updating or removing, you can manage watermarks efficiently, maintaining document integrity while catering to your branding needs.

code_1.title: Java Example: Edit PDF Watermark
code_1.content: This Java example demonstrates how to edit an existing watermark in a PDF document, showcasing how to adjust its properties programmatically.
code_1.comment_1: Load the PDF document for processing
code_1.comment_2: Search for specific watermarks that meet your criteria
code_1.comment_3: Edit the watermark's settings, such as size, color, and position
code_1.comment_4: Save the updated document to a local system or stream it directly

about.title: {{ProdFullName}} library
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} is a comprehensive solution for managing watermarks using {{EnvName}} environment. With this tool, developers can easily perform operations such as adding, editing, searching, and removing watermarks from documents in various file formats, including PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, email, and image formats. {{ProdShortName}} supports all major operating systems and Node.js versions.
